{{infobox character | people=[[Ents|Ent]] | name=Carandrian | image= | caption= | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Fangorn Forest]]
[[Isengard]] | affiliation=[[Quickbeam]] | language=[[Entish]] | birth= | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Carandrian''' was an [[Ent]] of [[Quickbeam]]'s folk, according to the draft version of the chapter ''[[Flotsam and Jetsam]]''.{{WR|1|IV}}, pp. 54-5 == History == Carandrian was a friend of Quickbeam, and one of the Ents that took part in the [[Battle of Isengard]]; during the battle he was injured by an axe, which enraged the rest of the Ents. == Etymology == The name ''Carandrian'' is in [[Noldorin]]. Its meaning is unclear, but it might contain the element ''[[caran]]'' ("red"), according to [[Roman Rausch]].{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=http://eldamo.org/content/words/word-169502869.html|articlename=N. ''Carandrian'' m.|website=Eldamo|accessed=22 March 2022}} {{references}} [[Category:Ents]] [[Category:Noldorin names]] [[Category:Third Age characters]]
